thread.title: Restaurant inspections: Miami County and Piqua health inspections
thread.title_full: Restaurant inspections: Miami County and Piqua health inspections | www.daytondailynews.com

author: Freelancer
title: Restaurant inspections: Miami County and Piqua health inspections
text:
From Miami County and City of Piqua Health Department reports:
Lucky’s Pad
Address: 226 W. Water St., Piqua
Date of inspection: Oct. 5
Violations/comments: Container of olives thawing on counter. Container marked keep refrigerated. Thawing should not occur on counter. Thaw in refrigerator, while cooking, under running/draining water or in microwave if cooked immediately. Provide metal stem thermometer so food temperature can be monitored. The fan, utensil pack and microwave interior need to be cleaned.
Garbry Ridge
Address: 1567 Garbry Road, Piqua
Date of inspection: Oct. 2
Violations/comments: Satisfactory at time of inspection.
Piqua Marathon
Address: 226 W. Water St., Piqua
Date of inspection: Oct. 2
Violations/comments: Satisfactory at time of inspection.
Troy Christian High School
Address: 700 S. Dorset Road, Troy
Date of inspection: Sept. 1
Violations/comments: Food service in good operation at time of inspection. Emergency handbook given as a handout.
VFW Post 4235
Address: 173 N. High St., Covington
Date of inspection: Aug. 31
Violations/comments: Facility good at time of inspection. Note: remember to clean ice machine all parts when necessary.
Village Sunoco
Address: 211 S. Main St., Pleasant Hill
Date of inspection: Aug. 31
Violations/comments: Walk-in milk trays have build up of debris. Wash, rinse and sanitize more regularly to prevent debris buildup.
Wendy’s Restaurant
Address: 1300 Archer Drive, Troy
Date of inspection: Sept. 2
Violations/comments: Floor needs regrouted. Grout levels are very low and some areas are not present. Observed dual side prep cooler unit not holding temperature controlled for safety foods at 41 degrees F or below to limit growth of bacteria. Managers removed certain foods and time marked other foods. Fix cooler issue immediately, ensure 41 degrees F or below. Observed chicken breast (grilled) not holding 135 degrees or greater to limit growth of bacteria. This food must maintain 135 degrees or greater hot holding. Fix issue immediately.
Clark’s Pizza House
Address: 24 N. High St., Covington
Date of inspection: Sept. 11
Violations/comments: Observed two containers of ice cream in freeze that was employees’. Personal food must be stored separate from food to prevent cross contamination. The two-door salad prep refrigerator has water standing in bottom. Repair. No hand drying provisions found at hand sink. Towels must be available.
Covington Elementary School
Address: 707 Chestnut St., Covington
Date of inspection: Sept. 10
Violations/comments: Operation in good condition at time of inspection.
Ducky’s
Address: 100 W. Market St., Troy
Date of inspection: Sept. 9
Violations/comments: Owner is having equipment maintained at time of inspection. Have holder or correct paper towels in restroom. Observed paper towels not in holder.
Harrison’s
Address: 106 E. Main St., Tipp City
Date of inspection: Sept. 9
Violations/comments: Observed the handle of ice scoop in ice behind the bar. The handle must be stored out of ice to prevent contamination. Observed an open bag of flour in basement Store food in containers to protect. Observed soup in warmer at 131-134 degrees F to limit germ growth. Butter cups found at 66 degrees F. Keep less than 41 degrees F. Observed trash on ground in dumpster area. Clean are more often. Observed some gnats in dish area. Consult with pest control to eliminate.
Los Pitayos
Address: 2317 W. Main St., Troy
Date of inspection: Sept. 10
Violations/comments: Deep clean cutting board to remove stained area. If that does not work, resurface or replace. Ice scoop observed in ice machine. Store scoop in clean area, not in ice machine. Replace faucet at hand sink in kitchen area. It is leaking and loose. Replaced damaged gasket on walk-in cooler door.
Subway Tipp City
Address: 982 W. Main St., Tipp City
Date of inspection: Sept. 9
Violations/comments: Satisfactory at time of inspection.
Van Cleve Elementary
Address: 617 E. Main, Troy
Date of inspection: Sept. 10
Violations/comments: Satisfactory at time of inspection.
Tipp O the Town Restaurant
Address: 1150 W. Main St., Tipp City
Date of inspection: Sept. 10
Violations/comments: Observed boxes of food on floor in walk-in freezer. Store all food six inches off floor to prevent contamination. When dish machine tested, no bleach sanitizer was found in water. Repairman called immediately. The three-tank system set up. All food contact must be sanitized to limit growth. Test often. The carpet in dining room still needs replaced. Observed one nonworking freezer and one nonworking prep refrigerator outside behind facility. Dispose of unnecessary equipment.
